20.07.17.name: wordpress/word-of-the-day-from-thefreedictionarycom
20.07.17.description:
This is a Wordpress Widget that displays an English Word-of-the-Day. It provides a word, along with a definition and an example usage.

The actual word is provided by TheFreeDictionary.com to your wordpress blog. TFD refers to TheFreeDictionary.com .
